set.name: DMD-27 Custom Transformation Deck Revolution vs. Invasion: Explosive Passion Fire Civilization

property.name: Race
property.value: Gaial Command Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When you put this creature during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules

property.value: DMD-27 Custom Transformation Deck Revolution vs. Invasion: Explosive Passion Fire Civilization

property.name: Race
property.value: Flame Monster/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Hachiko, Jin's Faithful Dog from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-27 Custom Transformation Deck Revolution vs. Invasion: Explosive Passion Fire Civilization

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mega Command Dragon/Revolutionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ While battling, this creature can't be destroyed. ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 13000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-27 Custom Transformation Deck Revolution vs. Invasion: Explosive Passion Fire Civilization

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mega Command Dragon/Revolutionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a fire Revolutionary evolution creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, your Revolutionary evolution creatures cost up to 3 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +3000 power, "double breaker" and Mega Command Dragon as an additional race.
